projects.title: Fergus James Jewelry
projects.description: A luxury jewelry e-commerce platform specializing in custom diamond engagement rings, offering a seamless browsing and buying experience with a focus on personalization and trust.

caseStudy.overview: Fergus James is a luxury jewelry brand focused on custom-made diamond engagement rings, offering customers a high-end online experience that combines craftsmanship, transparency, and convenience.
caseStudy.challenge: The client needed a platform that could showcase premium jewelry collections with high-quality imagery, support a global audience, integrate with secure payment gateways, and provide a smooth custom ring-building experience.
caseStudy.solution: We developed a fully responsive React-based SPA integrated with a headless CMS for dynamic content management. We implemented advanced product filtering, a 3D ring customization feature, and secure payment processing with Stripe. Performance optimization and SEO best practices were applied to maximize organic reach.
results: Increased online sales by 40% in the first quarter
Reduced bounce rate by 35% through improved UX
Achieved top rankings for competitive diamond ring keywords
Enabled customers to customize rings with live previews
